title: No Authentication
description: The request did not contain any authorization information. Please check your request

title: Multiple Authorizations Sent
description: The request contained multiple sets of authorization data. Please only supply one

title: JSON Web Key Set not loadable
description: The JSON Web Key Set required to validate the access tokens could no be loaded

title: JSON Web Key Set not parseable
description: The JSON Web Key Set required to validate the access tokens could no be parsed from the response returned by the OpenID Connect provider

title: Unauthorized: Incorrect Audience
description: The access token does not contain the correct audience needed to access this application. Please check the 'aud' claim

title: Unauthorized: Invalid Issued At
description: The value set in the 'iat' field of the access token is invalid. Please check the claim 'iat'

title: Unauthorized: Invalid Issuer
description: The access token has not been issued by a configured openid connect provider

title: Unauthorized: Claim missing
description: The access token is missing some required claims. Please check your configuration and openid connect provider

title: Unauthorized: Access Token Expired
description: The access token used to access the application has expired. Please request a new access token from the openid connect provider

title: Unauthorized: Token used before validity
description: The access token used to access the application has been used before it becomes valid. Please retry your request later

title: Unauthorized: Unknown Reason
description: The access token is invalid but the reason is not known. Please contact your administrator

title: Userinfo Endpoint Discovery Fail
description: The userinfo endpoint could not be discovered by the backend. Please check your configuration and provider
